articles.title: Pilates instructor 'accuses Pittsburgh Steelers player of cheating on his girlfriend of three years' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jennifer Woodward revealed on TikTok that she had been messaging and hooking up with an unnamed NFL player.  She contacted the girlfriend, sending her screenshots of their messages.
articles.content:
A Los Angeles Pilates instructor has accused an NFL star of being a player of another kind and now he's paid the price for it.
